title: SR is now available in all queues. I have all of the role icons. Teambuilder is now useless to me.

replies.body: It can't compete with normals. It could *replace* normals and be really even better (with a few tweaks), but we both know that's not likely to happen.

> It can't compete with normals. It could *replace* normals and be really even better (with a few tweaks), but we both know that's not likely to happen.

Kinda. Realistically: Normal Draft > Normal Teambuilder > Normal Blind

The main issue I have with teambuilder is that I don't know what the point of it is. Like, was it only ever created to replace normal blind? Cos' it can't be used for ranked (which is what people actually wanted it for) because it skips the entire draft process.

If I'm not mistaken it was made so people could do what they want rather than always conforming to the META. So people could captain a team and choose an all mid or duo top set up (for a couple of examples) without other people on their team being upset about it.

And then Riot added the ability to kick...

You literally HAVE to play the meta now or you get kicked. I got kicked from 6 lobbies in a row for wanting to go support GP and I was building full support GP too.
